snippet.title: Batman Trailer - Specular Games - New Arcade Game!
snippet.description:
Where does he get all those wonderful toys?

Arkham Asylum's most dangerous criminals have broken out and are creating chaos all over town. Choose your favorite Batmobile and use its fearsome arsenal to make the streets of Gotham City safe again.

Specular Interactive is proud to announce our newest game for 2013: Batman

Look for the Batman arcade game at your favorite arcade this holiday season!

For more information, please visit our official website at: http://bit.ly/1guIe1x

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/SpecularGames

And check out our Q&A with Arcade Heroes at: http://bit.ly/16KnU72
